xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.1.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Indriyaduka
Kusalattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Indriyaduka
75.
322Indriyapaccayā nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
  •  Tika
  •  Catukka
<< Catukkaup Tika >>
